    pfs="Standard"
>
[Amulet of the Third Eye](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2132)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 102 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 15,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn amulet

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This large brass medallion hangs low on the torso. It's shaped in the form of an unblinking eye, with a ring of turquoise as the iris and an orb of jet serving as the pupil. The amulet grants you a +2 item bonus to Perception checks. When you invest the amulet, you either increase your Wisdom score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever is higher.
